text:
Quartzy | Palo Alto, CA | Onsite (Relocation provided)

Quartzy helps hundreds of thousands of scientists improve the efficiency of their research by saving them time and money. Our team is passionate about accelerating scientific research through well-designed, meaningful tools for labs in academic institutions as well as pharma/biotech companies.
